alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 3:41PM EDT until April 08 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Ochlockonee River near Concord (CR 12) affecting Leon and Gadsden Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ochlockonee River near Concord (CR 12). * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Primary access to homes along county highway 12 on the east bank of the river in Leon County may become restricted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 36.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 36.2 feet on 01/08/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 11 pm this evening.
